website_summaries.verdict: A good pair of 5.25-inch coaxial car speakers that are the right balance of premium features and economic pricing.
pros: Extra durable speaker construction keeps the speakers protected from the abuse of daily driving
The use of extra foam around the sound cone improves the quality of the audio without requiring more expensive equipment
cons: Recommended 60-Watt input rating will usually require an aftermarket stereo

customer_reviews.title: Must buy! Great quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised at the poor quality speakers my 2015 Jeep Grand Cherokee had. As you can tell the magnet for the stock speaker. The front and rear door speaker magnets are very small compared to the Jbl. Instead of buying the 6 by 9 component speakers for the front doors I tried the 6 by 9 coaxial and they’re great. My only complaint is that the fitment was not perfect. Jbl should make the speaker holes longer. Other than that they are awesome.The new jbl speakers produce way more bass, and add more clarity without an amp. It comes with all the necessary hardware to install. It was an easy installation.
customer_reviews.author: rudy

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good speakers for the price
customer_reviews.text: I was going between these or the more expensive JBL models, I ended up going with 2 sets of these for my Chevy trucks front and door speakers. I only ran then for a few days on the factory radio before upgrading, but they sounded crisp and clear on both the factory and my new aftermarket radio. They don't have much bass, but they aren't supposed to, these are meant to be used in conjunction with a subwoofer, as such the highs and mids from them are pretty good, specially considering the price. Plus I mean, they're JBLs! JBL has always been known for quality products!
customer_reviews.author: Ty Joyce

customer_reviews.title: Excellent addition to a 2005 GMC Canyon
customer_reviews.text: After spending hours researching which speakers to buy for my GMC Canyon, I ended up going with these and I do not regret it at all.JBL is a great brand and these speakers are excellent value for your money. Sound and quality is instantly better than the awful stock speakers I had before. They also arrived much quicker than I expected. I live in British Columbia, Canada and I wasn't expecting them to arrive within a week of my order being placed, but they showed up. Happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: Goose

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound all around
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sound all around. The bass is clean and adequate, and the mids and highs are clear and accurate. The fit is standard and not too deep. These are a great value compared to several other brands that I tested. The full range sound would be very difficult to beat in this price range. Mounting screws were included as well as gasket tape to reduce noise.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Tweeters are small, good bass
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t use the tweeters they were super small, I used a pair of tweeters I already had installed and the sound is great. My last speakers only played down to 125hz and subwoofer cuts off at 50hz So there was a good gap there, mostly mid bass. These cheap speakers fixed my issue with the gap in frequencies and now I have that sound I was looking for. Im giving them around 150watts of power to each speaker +tweeter. Tight mid bass, has more bass then I thought it would
customer_reviews.author: caleb

customer_reviews.title: Beats the mess out of stock.
customer_reviews.text: Clear sound and handles all the power my modest deck can throw at them. They brought forth a great upgrade from whatever plastic film Honda decided to throw in my car. No regrets. By themselves, they’re about what you’d expect from a modest 6.5” set. Great when combined with my 10” sub and set to 63 or 80Hz HPF to save the headroom. Very clear and defined. (I really miss my pair of 12s, but I don’t have an SUV anymore.) Had them in the car most of this year and just starting to notice they’re kinda cold sounding, but that’s only after upgrading my home stereo. Might not be a fair comparison whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: Leann Leyva

customer_reviews.title: They are 150 watts not 300 as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t like the fact they advertise 300 watts in reality they are 150 Watts each. Very misleading to someone with an amp. But they sound great. Fit perfectly and I don’t need 300 watt capability. For the price they are excellent .they put out perform the pioneer set of speakers with the same specifications to the point I am ordering another set of JBL’s to replace them with.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: JBL great as always
customer_reviews.text: Installed this a week ago and the sound in my CRV is just outstanding. I used these as rear speakers in my car, and purchased the component system for the fronts, and I just love listening to music or video in my car. Combine these with the JBL component system and you are gold.
customer_reviews.author: Sean T.

customer_reviews.title: Good for price
customer_reviews.text: Put into my miata, I can clearly hear the music with the top down going 80 but if you’re looking for a premium system you might wanna spend more. Not much bass, it’ll start to crackle.
customer_reviews.author: Bailey LeMay

customer_reviews.title: Great speakers, but not for professional grade amplifiers
customer_reviews.text: These were very crisp and clear speakers. Great sound and very easy to use. I connected these to my JL audio RD900/5 channel amp. They were awesome for mid range sound and the treble was astounding. I soldered my speaker wire directly on the speakers. However, they took awhile to break in for bass, and when they did, they blew. Only had them for about 2 weeks pushing 100-120 hertz and they blew with barely any volume. Not sure if the price was worth it, but these would be great for a home system.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Superb 👌
customer_reviews.text: I've always bought cheapo pioneer and jvc speakers but man am I glad I splurged on these club series 6.5" speakers. Sound quality is superb when partnered with there matching tweeters up front and 6x9" in the rear 👌
customer_reviews.author: GrantKOP4life

customer_reviews.title: Clean, crisp sound
customer_reviews.text: Replaced stock Bose speaker with these. They sound good and the tweeters are a nice crisp clean sound compared to the factory speakers.
customer_reviews.author: Fred H

customer_reviews.title: 150w
customer_reviews.text: These are not 300w per speaker! They are 150 a piece, They only have a Rms of 50. This title is very misleading, I thought I was getting a 300w speaker for each speaker, not them adding 150+150 for each to get 300w.
customer_reviews.author: derike

customer_reviews.title: Sweet mids!
customer_reviews.text: Sweet mids and crisp but not harsh highs with this speaker. Not a lot of bass but I knew that before I made the purchase and that wasn’t my target. If you aren’t looking for a mid-bass coax 6.5” speaker, the mids from this speaker is simply superb! One can really become mesmerized from the detail and articulation, just don’t expect much below 60-70 hz as this speaker lacks much on the bottom, but if you have a sub and are rolling the bass off your front or rear speakers then these are hard to beat!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin D Parrish

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price, should buy if any one needs to replace old speakers. Loud , nice and tight bass......just replace after market speakers with these and so far I'm happy they sound better than the old ones, need to use an amp to push them ...the only con is that they don't come with a bracket and grill....but they sound sweet and loud..
customer_reviews.author: joseM

customer_reviews.title: Factory upgrade
customer_reviews.text: It's a good upgrade from factory speakers also the lower ohm lets a factory deck push them a little better. it's a good deal for around 50 bucks a set of two speakers. 50 watts rms per speaker it says on the box. I would buy them again. Sound quality is clean!
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: I'm so very happy I chose these speakers
customer_reviews.text: I've had these speakers for over 6 months. They finally sound perfect. It's like they had to get broken in. You know like a pair of new shoes. They sounded good when they were first put in, and now I feel like I'm getting a concert performance when I'm streaming Pandora. The sound of sharp, crisp, and clear
customer_reviews.author: carla

customer_reviews.title: Don't but unless you are going to install in a car that has car grille already
customer_reviews.text: The speakers are ok for the price but one thing that I didn't like was the fact that it came with no grille to protect the speaker and no hardware wire nor screws .....other speakers of the same price point have all that I mentioned....so having said that , you end up spending another 10.00 just to get speaker grille ....so they end costing you more and thus not making it a bargain ....
customer_reviews.author: Loretta & Roc Salinas

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sound!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to replace my blown out factory cheap speakers. Wow what a difference in sound. I have a sub & amp in my trunk so I wanted the highs & mids & these things did not disappoint!! Amazing sound quality. I purchased the wire adapters & mounting brackets for my GM car & they were installed & going in 20 minutes or less.
customer_reviews.author: glockshooter394

customer_reviews.title: Great sound for little money
customer_reviews.text: These speakers sounded great when I first installed them they lacked bass a little bit but after a month they sound completely different MUCH better I can crank them up with no distortion they sound great matched with my jbl gto629s in the front. At first I was skeptical they looked kinda slim and smaller magnets than I imagined no problems yet I love my new speakers!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Valentine

customer_reviews.title: Piece of shit
customer_reviews.text: Extremely high pitched and tinny, and already blew the right front door speaker on factory headunit if I could give a lower score I would.
customer_reviews.author: gregory dumas

customer_reviews.title: Nice alternative that fits nicely between my hot and harsh ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice alternative that fits nicely between my hot and harsh Kicker 44KST2504s and mellow Pioneer TS-T110s. These little things are crisp and clean. Running these through a stock WRX 17 head unit mated with an Alpine Power Pack with Morrell door speakers and a Kicker OEM sub.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: 2000 VW beetle
customer_reviews.text: had to get adapters for them to click into my bug but they sound amazing and have awesome bass. if you have a foreign car definitely look into what it takes to install them lol, i had to wait another week for the adapters to arrive before i could install them but they were so worth the wait, AWESOME!
customer_reviews.author: Jorden

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Installation was straight forward. IF for some reason you need instructions to install these speakers don't expect the ones included to be of any use. Probably one of the worse I've ever seen.
customer_reviews.author: Just Sayin

customer_reviews.title: Good sound for the size.  Better than the factory speakers.
customer_reviews.text: Good speakers but as everyone knows it is difficult to get big sound out of small speakers. Much better than the factory speakers. PITA to install on my Chevy Silverado regular cab work truck.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Childers

customer_reviews.title: Great for c5 Z06 corvette
customer_reviews.text: Fits my c5 z06 perfect do not get the gx502 speaker the mounting depth is too big and hits the back of the body. Much better sound especially highs.
customer_reviews.author: MrClean

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive upgrade for OEM RV spekers
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the 6.5" 2-way speakers to replace the interior ceiling speakers in my fifth wheel toy hauler. These fit the same round cutouts but their construction was much more substantial than the cheap plastic marine speakers which came with the RV. The sound of these JBLs was much better. This was a great low cost plug-and-play upgrade.
customer_reviews.author: Wires 89085

customer_reviews.title: looks like I received a returned pair.
customer_reviews.text: I returned for a new pair will update once received. Update: I received my new pair within a couple of days and installed them right away. The sound is great and couldn't be happier. They deliver a clean sound that hits all the sounds perfectly. Very satisfied with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Edward

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product I recommend it
customer_reviews.text: Great little tweeter definitely happy with the performance and sound of this product I removed my jl audio tweeter find out this sounds just like old ones or better.
customer_reviews.author: Francognlz

customer_reviews.title: Best upgrade I have done yet.
customer_reviews.text: These speakers are some of the clearest sounding speakers I have ever heard. Installation was easy, it has a basically universal installation mount, and it's made of plastic, allowing me to clip off the parts that I don't need that cause it not to fit. Definitely recommend, especially to someone just using their factory speakers.
customer_reviews.author: Austin Grace

customer_reviews.title: Punchy bass
customer_reviews.text: Very tight bass. Tweeters are a little harsh but not bad. For being 4 inches they but out a very tight punchy bass. Heads up though that they are 3 ohms.
customer_reviews.author: Brock Camper

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and value
customer_reviews.text: They were easy to install and definitely sound better than the old speakers that were in there. I would buy again. I dont have anything else to compare them to other than stock speakers and they are definitely alot better. Bass is decent, I dont expect them to have a boom like a subwoofer so I am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: GN

customer_reviews.title: Stay away! Poor quality overall!
customer_reviews.text: The little crossover started to malfunction on one of sides after two weeks of the install. Causing it to short my amplifier. Took it a professional who sold me some JL audio regular loud speakers and they are 5x crisper and louder then these jbl’s. I would recommend to stay away. Wasted the money buying these.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Very nice i will be buying again
customer_reviews.text: Very nice for the money i will be buying my sister some for her car. They are loud enough to only need my volume at 14. They have alot of bass (should get even better as they break in). I 100% recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew A.

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality of speakers
customer_reviews.text: Honestly I had bad experience and the customer service was really bad the speakers hard to install instructions are bad but it's not important can just take to the shop, sound is good but less then 3 weeks two speakers went out and I called no one helped neither contacted me back and after a while the other one went out like wtf
customer_reviews.author: George B

customer_reviews.title: Great tweeters/high end...Poor bass
customer_reviews.text: Excellent high pass/ tweeters are great for the price...but... the bass rattles the speaker like none other. I have these as my front speakers and have a high pass filter on the front sending my bass to my subs in the back. For that purpose these speakers are great
customer_reviews.author: Cody C.

customer_reviews.title: Save your time and money and get something of better quality.
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 pairs to install in the doors of my truck. Even with the stock stereo these speakers sounded horrible. Installed the alpine ilx-w650 with the 450 power pack amp and it was even worse. Ended up installing some kicker component speakers to compliment the stereo and amp. Did use the speaker adapters though, so I guess theres that.
customer_reviews.author: A Consumer

customer_reviews.title: they aren't bad, just not great
customer_reviews.text: they are much better then stock jeep jk speakers but they are sub par to many other speaks at this price range, wish I went with kicker
customer_reviews.author: James T Olive

customer_reviews.title: JBL 6.5 speakers
customer_reviews.text: Quick easy install on my civic si sedan. Had an old pair of jbl subs and amp lying around. Bought these to compliment my install. Suppringly has a decent amount of bass to them. Running off my aftermarket sony xavax1000 with no added amp. Sounds great
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Good value, rugged and 3 ohm power
customer_reviews.text: I have become a fan of JBL's latest offerings. Placed 2 different pairs of 6.5 coaxials in 3D printed tower cans, intended for marine or off road usage. Both feature poly cones and rubber surrounds, so long life can be expected. The style JBL infuses into these also makes them desirable. I have them set up in my workshop for long term testing.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Palguta

customer_reviews.title: You can’t get better speaker for $60.
customer_reviews.text: These are my go to speaker! They are much better than many higher priced options and better than every lower priced option.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: It sounds really good and it made a lot of difference.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these 6.5 and 3.5 speakers for my rear doors and dash of my 2017 Subaru Outback. You need a speaker adapter and the plug and play wire from Matra to easily install it but I splice and crimp the wires to attach dash speakers. I just wanted to replace my stock speaker and I am not planning to add an amp or anything but I am surprise how good this sounds. It made a lot of difference. Wow.
customer_reviews.author: RON L.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I replaced my stock 09 civic speakers and these were obviously a major upgrade. Being 4.5" speakers, bass wasn't expected but I was surprised at how much these tiny things put out. Clear highs and good mids, they are perfect if you pair them with a sub. 10/10 would reccomend!
customer_reviews.author: Phillip O'larte

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Not impressed with sound quality or lows. I have a sub and these still get drown out. The mounting depth is nice for a BMW E53. For the price they’re ok but definitely will upgrade
customer_reviews.author: Peter F.

customer_reviews.title: Great speakers.
customer_reviews.text: The bass sounds a little strange on some songs. These however arent subwoofers. Great sound quality. Very loud.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas W.

customer_reviews.title: Small speakers with great sound.
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of research into 4x6 speakers as I wanted to keep my vehicle stock and still have a great sound quality. These speakers exceeded my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Excellent buy . Accurate sound , JBL never disappoints!
customer_reviews.text: This speaker set is super clear with suitable bass , more accurate and clear than any speaker I've seen for the price point . It's depth may be an issue for some applications so you may have to get creative but it's worth it . Mine sound outstanding up front in my Toyota Sequoia .
customer_reviews.author: sirkaos

customer_reviews.title: JBL is the way to go
customer_reviews.text: Ive used many JBL speakers in the past and went with these in hopes that they perform like the old ones did. Yes, yes they do, my stock system now sounds amazing at all levels. No distortion and it goes nice and loud. I thought it would need an amp but i was wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good sound for the money
customer_reviews.text: Sound great. Installed in the rear doors of my son in law's SUV. Doing a great job. He loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Davidoski

customer_reviews.title: Great speakers!
customer_reviews.text: Great speakers! I'm no car audio expert or enthusiast, but the speakers sound nice. I bought these as a replacement for my 2007 Yukon Denali's stock speakers...
customer_reviews.author: Jason Weber

customer_reviews.title: These are quality replacement speakers .
customer_reviews.text: Great sound with the OEM stereo . Takes a couple weeks to bass to build . and JBL quality .
customer_reviews.author: Jc Knight

customer_reviews.title: upgrade from Mitsubishi mirage 2014 stock front speakers
customer_reviews.text: my head unit is pioneer avh-1300nex i didnt replace the wiring - it's whole stock i didnt feel any big improvement from the stock speakers maybe this is because i dont have external amp
customer_reviews.author: Eden

customer_reviews.title: Raw
customer_reviews.text: Great sound. I Bought the connectors for easy plug & play. Very easy to install. Wait about 1-2 months for them to break in. You’ll notice the difference & smile.
customer_reviews.author: Rizz

customer_reviews.title: Superior product
customer_reviews.text: I have never purchased a JBL product that did not deliver and these tweeters were no exception. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Ghostwolf RJ

customer_reviews.title: Much better!
customer_reviews.text: Really brightens the sound. It was a little harsh at first but as it broke in it mellowed out nicely.
customer_reviews.author: WI Eng

customer_reviews.title: You can't go wrong with these door speakers
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is great. Works great with bose system and aftermarket radio. They don't come with speaker wire. I purchased a plug and play harness so I can plug into the factory speaker harness on the door. The bass response is great. I not making this up about the sound quality.
customer_reviews.author: Remmell Chandler

customer_reviews.title: Clear. Loud. Best bang for the buck
customer_reviews.text: My first set of components. Easy to install and they blow away the coaxial 6x9s I had in the door prior. Running them on a Jeep Cherokee which does have a factory amp so I can't vouch for how they would sound on a lower wattage system but I am definitely pleased with these.
customer_reviews.author: curt

customer_reviews.title: Excellent speaker
customer_reviews.text: Excellent price. Great sound from these little speakers. They top of the upper tenge of the bass nicely!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Need to amplify these speakers if you want best quality out of them
customer_reviews.text: The speakers have decent mid range bass but the highs are not what i expected at all. Was hoping I was doing myself favor upgrading my factory speakers but they didnt compair in the slightest. May sound better if amplified but didn't want to spend more money to do that.
customer_reviews.author: travis hansen

customer_reviews.title: Super clean sound worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: I wasn’t into sound systems but this made me change my mind, every drive is a lot more enjoyable, clear sound, crisp notes what else can you ask for....
customer_reviews.author: fernando j.

customer_reviews.title: These speakers sound great for tweeters ONLY!
customer_reviews.text: These speakers have excellent high’s!!! If any tiny amount of bass go through them at a low volume, they sound blown. I’m really disappointed with JBL for the first time. They will sound great if you run them through a crossover and use them as tweeters.
customer_reviews.author: Rita Lee

customer_reviews.title: Does no fit 2016 HONDA pilot
customer_reviews.text: checked Official website it says fit, but when Itried to install it won't. The adapter is like 1mm bigger than the hole on winshield beam.
customer_reviews.author: protel

customer_reviews.title: Better than OE
customer_reviews.text: I installed these on a 2010 Camaro. You will need to modify the installation a bit but it’s as expected since they aren’t OE but sound wayyy better
customer_reviews.author: jesse m

customer_reviews.title: Decent Speakers
customer_reviews.text: Happy with them, could have a little more bass but they are nice.
customer_reviews.author: Joe V

customer_reviews.title: Recommend it for a low budget.
customer_reviews.text: These are a good product for the price. If you are looking for a good product at a cheap price this is a good solution.
customer_reviews.author: Javier Ramos

customer_reviews.title: These are very nice speakers for the price
customer_reviews.text: These are very nice speakers for the price! I hooked these up without an amplifier and they made my music sound so clean and the amp makes them play clear and powerful, even with my windows up you can hear every single lyric perfectly. I definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jonah Partida

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Sounds super good compared to the speakers I had before Would buy again
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Hesitant but awesome
customer_reviews.text: Have had these for almost a year now and would highly recommend. I have mine in a GMC Sierra 2003 and they work great. Good bass and all around just good speakers
customer_reviews.author: Mishila Bledsoe

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic value
customer_reviews.text: Way better than the kicker coaxials I used to have, they even come with the 3 point adapters that I needed for the sound bar in my jeep
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: You won’t regret buying this speakers!!!
customer_reviews.text: Nice speakers, good price and sounds is good enough for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great
customer_reviews.text: They sound really good. I wish it came with grills
customer_reviews.author: Harmon Ford

customer_reviews.title: Good speakers
customer_reviews.text: I installed them instead of my regular speakers The quality overall is not much diffrent but only in low volumes. As the volume goes up the factory 20w rms speakers start to ramble and swallow bass while those keep outputting clear sound with good bass
customer_reviews.author: Shay B.

customer_reviews.title: Great sound quality
customer_reviews.text: They sound fantastic swap my stock tweeters and these improve sound quality by a lot and especially having the crossover with them great addition to the vehicle without blowing the budget.
customer_reviews.author: c4rloz

customer_reviews.title: Don't Buy this one.
customer_reviews.text: Terrible product to represent the JBL name. I own several of their products & this is the first regrettable one. They crackle at anything over half volume and I have bass blockers on them. It's gotten so bad I can't even have them connected anymore. Don't buy these.
customer_reviews.author: Marielle

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I like the sound that came from these sleakers! Better than my factory car speakers, there was some manipulating to fit them but easy manipulation.
customer_reviews.author: JUSTIN

customer_reviews.title: Phuckin loud!
customer_reviews.text: This package screams! Installed in ford transit and its a huge upgrade from the stock. Unbelievable sound for a unbelievable price!
customer_reviews.author: Jake 2

customer_reviews.title: Great price and the speakers sound great
customer_reviews.text: Great price and the speakers sound great. Very clear sound and no distortion. Pretty easy to install and they give you several different brackets and pieces to work for a variety of mounting applications. Keep in mind you will need to run your own wiring to and from the crossover box.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Work amazing. Great sound. Love jbl and these club are solid
customer_reviews.author: AbunchAletters

customer_reviews.title: Not for Wrangler
customer_reviews.text: NOT FOR JK SOUND BAR'S. Good sound good speaker. If you have to use the adapter plate it's a pain in the ***. But they look good sound good.
customer_reviews.author: that guy <--

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Still early since I installed these speakers, so far I am pleased with the sound quality.
customer_reviews.author: Sabree

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price. Excellent sound quality. Just what my vehicle needed.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Witt

customer_reviews.title: Good product. Cheap. Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: I loved this product! I installed them in a nissan altima 2015 and they sound amazing. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Fernando

customer_reviews.title: Valuable Speaker
customer_reviews.text: Great price and great quality. Good match with Kenwood aftermarket radio.
customer_reviews.author: Old School

customer_reviews.title: Not for bass.
customer_reviews.text: They look good. Hooked up fine. I just need something that doesnt crackle when I play music or use my bluetooth to answer phone calls 🙄 these can NOT handle any bass.
customer_reviews.author: rachel jackson

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: My subs sounded good but these speakers made them sound even better! They are definitely worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Ford

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfect in 1997 Ford Escort LX.
customer_reviews.text: Great Bass. Good Quality. Just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Johan Mall

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality/Bass
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality/clarity is a solid 4 out of 5 stars. The bass is a tight/punch type of bass, not a deep/heavy bass. They are the perfect upgrade for door speakers, in my opinion. Excellent product for a fair, and solid price.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon J.

customer_reviews.title: Blown after 23 days
customer_reviews.text: They were amazing sounding speakers until 23 days after the install the right side tweeter has blown without warning. They were not being overpowered rather they were being underpowered from a stock 2014 ford fusion head unit.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob C

customer_reviews.title: Jeet
customer_reviews.text: Fits pretty well in my e36 coupe kick panel is a direct fit, Twitters need will need some modifications to make it fit n the oem speaker which was really easy, great miss bass and highs
customer_reviews.author: jose luis ayarde lara

customer_reviews.title: If they fail no warranty
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these and the tweeter just went out and its hooked up to a stock stereo the seller says there burnt and there no warranty had them less than a couple of weeks garbage!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: The tweeters and crossovers are a little small but this system sounds good even with just an aftermarket head unit for power. Good value
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great speakers!
customer_reviews.text: These speakers are incredible! Iv used many brands over the years and for the money these JBLs are the way to go! Couldn’t be happier. Highly recommend these speakers!
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Rock and Roll
customer_reviews.text: Assume speakers for the price they fit well and sound great
customer_reviews.author: Mike S

customer_reviews.title: Great speakers
customer_reviews.text: I got theses for my 2018 Nissan Rogue and they sound great, I just had to buy the adapters. The rings it came with didn’t line up with my suv but that was expected. But overall it’s a great product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Silva

customer_reviews.title: Great Speakers
customer_reviews.text: Installed with my factory radio head. 2004 Mercedes SL500. Great sound and booming base. Replaced worn out factory Bose speakers. Much better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Skinner

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: These were a Christmas gift for my son and he is very happy with them
customer_reviews.author: PottHead

customer_reviews.title: Not 70 watts RMS. Speakers are 35 watts RMS
customer_reviews.text: On the description of the speakers it said it was 70 watts RMS, But when they came in it said 35 watts RMS on the box. I hooked them up anyway and they were heavily distorted do not make the same mistake I did.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin McCreary

customer_reviews.title: Busted speakers strait out of the box.
customer_reviews.text: Got these speakers to replace factory ones in a Jeep Wrangler. Started crackling strait out of the box and the volume wasn’t even halfway up. Very disappointed with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Alisa Crozier

customer_reviews.title: crazy good sound
customer_reviews.text: deep bass & very sharp highs... i am extremely satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Godwin Bassey

customer_reviews.title: Nice upgrade
customer_reviews.text: These sound awesome in my wife's crew cab Silverado. Especially when you take the time to tune your radio to these speakers.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy
